channel.title: Need saving method for saving points for a huge game i made
channel.description:
hey dudes well i'm busy on doing a project its pretty big and difficult i'm almost finished but i got a problem u need points and when u got like 30 i would say and u log out and back in it doesn't saved it and i added where it normally suppose to save it so ..
its the game tzok jad game
its really cool and need alot of attention not easy to code that so i wonna know it so i can maybe post it on mopar as tut not sure about it cuze its rlly big and i wonna keep it for my own :D
